title: Tour de France Stage 13: Philipsen Denies Van Aert in Reduced Sprint after Chaotic Day of Echelon Action
content:
Pogačar, Evenepoel, Vingegaard finish together after GC heavyweights Roglič and Ayuso abandon ahead of mountaintop doubleheader this weekend.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 13: Philipsen Denies Van Aert in Reduced Sprint after Chaotic Day of Echelon Action on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
